ygData.subject: Re: to the bayle list hunters..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, you re right about that, I did have to read the Lady Shae spoilers to get the first part.  Once you turn that in, though you get enough info to
ygData.messageBody:
Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> is it really fair to not help us out with info here? after all, the ONLY way
> you can know where the lists are located is if you do the PALADIN quests
> that relate the locations! raltur gives you NO hints, and as an sk of
> innoruuk, lady shae wont tell me anything no matter what i do. giving her
> beer doesnt help. shouldnt she at least have a note that says her bayle list
> was stolen by x? i know you cant do anything about that tho hehe..
>
> i've heard rumors of how the rest of the quest goes.. but even so it is
> terribly unfair for verant to give us a quest we cant complete without
> reading paladin spoiler sites ;p
>

Well, you're right about that, I did have to read the Lady Shae
spoilers to get the first part. Once you turn that in, though
you get enough info to locate the other parts. I don't know how
you would do this as an SK except paying someone else to do it for
you.

Xilith
